The dead giveaway that it's fake is the first line of the epilog:
Wow, two books down! One more to go!

I haven't downloaded this torrent, but based on what I've read in the comments I would say that this in actually "Harry Potter and the Ring of the Ancients" as written by "Harry Writer" over a year ago. I read this last June. There is a book 5 by this person as well that came out just before Order of the Phoenix (also called OotP).

If you want to read this fan fic, I would recomend trying to find his first book (order of the phoenix by Harry Writer, probably on kazaa or something) since they sort of go together.

Anyway, yes, this person spent a log of time on the fan fics and they're of high quality plot wise and worth a read, but they're terribly written if he/she wants to make them look like JKRs work. They're full of pop culture references and kids who speak hax0r.
itz fake u beezies.

What a load of bollox, after readin the first paragraph it becomes painfully clear that this is a god damn dirty fake. Especially where it says "Harry had set a personal record by chugging down fifty-three cans of soda" , 'soda' is an American colloquiallism for soft drinks and 'chugging' is anothr american word. JKR is British and i doubt she would use those words. Whoever posted this torrent is a wanker and should be shot for trying to promote this 3rd rate piece of shit fan-fic
